text: Hi all, does anyone know if there is a native Julia library which offers a way of calculating measures of spatial autocorrelation (mostly Moran’s I)?  I’ve looked through the <https://github.com/JuliaEarth/GeoStats.jl|GeoStats.jl> documentation but haven’t been able to find anything.

elements.text: Hi all, does anyone know if there is a native Julia library which offers a way of calculating measures of spatial autocorrelation (mostly Moran’s I)?  I’ve looked through the
documentation but haven’t been able to find anything.

text: I think some of these measures are equivalent to variograms. Did you have a chance to watch the video tutorials ? In particular the one called Variography Game?

elements.text: I think some of these measures are equivalent to variograms. Did you have a chance to watch the video tutorials ? In particular the one called Variography Game?

text: And contributions are very welcome if you feel a metric is missing :)

elements.text: And contributions are very welcome if you feel a metric is missing :)

text: Ahh, thanks so much for the quick reply! I’ll watch the tutorials this weekend and report back, but it looks like the variograms section will indeed have what I am looking for!
